amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing a funding stream for a voter reinfranchisement initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 367 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 133.

action.text: Amendment SA 367 proposed by Senator Cardin. (consideration: CR S1966-1967, S2013; text: CR S1966) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing a funding stream for a voter reinfranchisement initiative.
